original_text: More than that, I will cause the Egyptians to think well of you, my own people. So when you leave Egypt, they will give you many gifts.
korean_text: 내가 애굽 사람으로 이 백성에게 은혜를 입히게 할지라 너희가 나갈 때에 빈손으로 가지 아니하리니

sentences.original_text: I will cause the Egyptians to think well of you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이집트인들에게서 너희를 친절하게 대하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: they will give you many gifts
